entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Offer only "valid" suffix-appending fixes for ConvertToLibraryImport #87236
  • [Performance] Startup regression #87235
  • Reduce allocation cost of HttpRequestOptions #87234
    Future
  • Apt dependency `liblttng-ust1` missing for Ubuntu 22.04 + amd64 #87225
  • Field defined with profiling API contains out of thin air values #87213
  • Blazor - System.Security.Cryptography.Algorithms is not supported on this platform #87214
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow JsonObject.Remove during enumeration #87206
    Future
  • Error MSB4062: The "UpdateXlf" task could not be loaded from the assembly #87202
  • Investigate size increase when EventPipe library is enabled in NativeAOT #87201
    8.0.0
  • [mono]stackoverflow crash use jit-interp mixed mode #87200
  • [Bug] AssemblyLoadContext with unoading enabled will not unload when it contains compiled linq expressions or dynamic objects #87199

Closed

  • NRE in System.Text.RegularExpresssions on ARM64 #78340
    8.0.0
  • Developers should be able to use System.Text.Json in Native AOT seamlessly #79122
    8.0.0
  • Provide trim/AOT-safe mechanism to (de)serialize enums from strings with JSON source-gen #79311
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializer trimming tests should be re-written to use the source generator #53437
    Future
  • Source generator should share property-level custom converters #59041
    Future
  • JSON source gen does not work correctly with nullable structs with custom converter #70475
    Future
  • JSON needs object initializer equivalent APIs #73219
    Future
  • Improve formatting of System.Text.Json source generated output #79534
    Future
  • Failure when building self-hosted NativeAOT compiler changes with 8.0 Preview 2 SDK #83695
    8.0.0
  • Consider improving the source formatter in the STJ source generator #81260
    Future
  • Test failure readytorun\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\CpuId_R2R_Avx2\\CpuId_R2R_Avx2 #87118
  • ilcompiler: System.Diagnostics.Debugger.IsSupported has already been added #86186
    8.0.0
  • STJ source generator does not correctly wrap custom converters on nullable properties #81833
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/SIMD/VectorAdd_ro/VectorAdd_ro #87116
    8.0.0
  • Consolidate HashAlgorithmName->HashAlgorithm lookup tables #24471
    Future
  • [Linux] X509Chain: fails to consistently respect custom trusted roots with same subject #85830
    Future
  • ComInterfaceGenerator uses Diagnostic in incremental pipeline, which do not compare as equal in Roslyn #86736
    8.0.0
  • Where should I reach out about publishing a new patch for System.Text.Encoding? #86671
    8.0.0
  • AppHost.Bundle.Tests.BundleLocalizedApp.Bundled_Localized_App_Run_Succeeds failing #85993
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add stream support to IDbConnection #87092
  • Add back xunit decimal, IntPtr and UIntPtr commented test cases #27187
    Future
  • DualModeConnectAsync_DnsEndPointToHost_Helper failed with Timed out waiting for Connection #21853
    8.0.0
  • [WinServer 2012] Socket/TcpListener BeginAcceptTcpClient throws loop of SocketExceptions (10057) #922
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Code analyse rule that require passing of cancellation token #82889
  • Wasm.Build.Tests timeouts while waiting for the web server #86658
    8.0.0
  • Console.ReadKey with ConsoleModifiers.Control and ConsoleKey.Backspace doesn't work #84668

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing SHA3 helpers in HashAlgorithmNames #87237
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Move to libraries and runtime tests to the OSX 13 queue #87231
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Fix running debugger tests on windows #87228
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Setup for benchmark runs with physical promotion. #87227
    tenet-performance-benchmarks
  • Add analyzers and code-fixes to help adoption of source-generated COM #87223
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Don't publish wixpacks #87222
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Use HashCode.Combine() in interop source generators and analyzers instead of custom GetHashCode implementations #87221
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Simplify Random for ulong #87219
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fixes and improvements: #87218
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle primitive remainder stores to regularly promoted fields in physical promotion #87217
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Don't link Swift/CryptoKit on iOS-like platforms #87216
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ifdef out DynamicDependencies that are not necessary #87209
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • throw SocketException for Quic transport errors #87208
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Faster find unwind info on Unix #87204
    tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix reading runtime settings early in startup #87205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement JsonStringEnumConverter<TEnum> #87224
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Improve codegen for AVX-512 comparisons and general handling of `TYP_MASK` #87089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Apply source build patch #87226
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use Unsafe.BitCast for Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange of float/double #87166
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [VM] Fix potential undefined behavior #87119
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure the CPUID tests cover a couple hwintrinsic disablement edge cases #87127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow duplicate feature switch settings #87207
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tweak assert in AsyncTaskMethodBuilder #87215
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] Use underlying type in RuntimeHelpers.GetSpanDataFrom #87021
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 7.0.8
  • Add timestamps to XUnitLogChecker output #86737
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix handling of CreateScalarUnsafe for embedded broadcast #87134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Move the CreateCastingConverter<T>() method to the base JsonConverter type. #87211
    area-System.Text.Json, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Add back fixed xunit decimal, IntPtr and UIntPtr commented test cases #87084
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add workaround `NuGet-Migrations` issue for a missed case #87041
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make BundleLocalizedApp test stop requiring UTF8 output encoding #87176
    area-Single-File
  • Set ApiCompatIgnoreTargetPlatformMoniker for packable projects #87212
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable S.T.Json tests on NativeAOT #87203
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Disable System.Text.Json/AOT tests #87157
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-System.Text.Json
  • Update branding to 6.0.19 #87191
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.8 #87192
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • SHAKE128 and SHAKE256 #87099
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #87154
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Add mono hot reload support for updating parameter name #85796
    area-EnC-mono
  • JIT: Regularize readbacks for parameters/OSR-locals in physical promotion #87165
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Combine two table lookups into one while formatting Guid on Arm64 #87126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add managed entry points for raising Contention events #87087
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Reimplement NegotiateStream using (mostly) public NegotiateAuthenticaton API #86948
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16, and stop focusing on C++11 ABI stuff from CentOS 7 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [iOS][maccatalyst] Reenable MacCatalyst and Simulator CI runs #84930
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-ios
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Add JIT support for the methods in Vector128<T> on amd64. #86546
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn on visibility of interface and StringMarshallingCustomType #87065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Don't enable ILLink analyzers for unsupported TFMs #87071
    area-Meta
  • Warn on CustomMarshallerAnalyzer if the MarshaMode is not valid #87198
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Assign correct slots for open generic service descriptors during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [browser][MT] GC, threadpool and some JS interop improvements #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Upgrading Vector256/512 Shuffle() with VBMI support #87083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm][ios] Unblock System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.Tests Fails on iOS/tvOS/Wasm #87169
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js - follow up #87051
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Move DynamicCodeSupport default into aot targets #87135
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix a couple of issues related to Process.WaitForExit on Unix #87174
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [libs] Fix poll events conversion #86843
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • CoreCLR: vm: arm: Fix gcc arm asm build error #86692
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Repurpose Gen0ReductionCount field for dynamic heap count diagnostics. #87009
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #87175
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.x
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `FlipBit` #83400
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix a couple of inequalities in promotion decomposition #87186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Add IHostApplicationBuilder interface #86974
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • [wasm] Add PackedSimd load and load scalar methods #87052
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Disable the PackedSimd.Shuffle intrinsic. #86025
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][tests] Enable DriveInfoUnix test on tvOS #87162
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample as functional test on the simulator and maccatalyst on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update ClaimsIdentity debug display #87159
    area-System.Security
  • [NativeAOT] A few changes to make stack walks a bit faster #86690
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Inline TLS field access for linux #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Crossgen2 determinism issue #87193
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix(66900): Adding test for confirm bug fix. #87167
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #86358
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #86617
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix inline decision reporting + noinline propagation #87115
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add marshalling tests and warn if interface is partial #87146
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Nuget package file path casing incorrect on Linux #33089
  • "CreateAppHost" task failed unexpectedly (MacOS) - Could not set file permission 493 #27436
  • There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the Specified RuntimeIdentifier'browser-wasm' #27238
    Discussion
  • tmp file copy failed the Aot Test #30456
  • EnablePackageValidation reports CP1003 when multitargeting windows lib #28746
    8.0.1xx

Updated

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure that parameter default value don't change #30249
    Backlog
  • met a issue when using Add multiple C# projects to a solution #31615
    Backlog
  • MSBuild property ArtifactsPath is overloaded; used by both .Net 8 and Microsoft.Build.Artifacts #33052
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Watch.BrowserRefresh causes Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref 6.0 prebuilts #30272
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23276.4]Unable to cast object of type when passing data(custom type) to a component in Blazor Apps after building #32967
  • dotnet tools are not able to work with process which is running under tmux #33044
  • Version number is missing from dotnet publish output in linux docker images #12913
  • Net 7 sdk build freezes computer #27697
  • [Megathread] Infrastructure Issues #28442
  • [API Compat] unify error message style across rules #25564
    Backlog
  • [NETE2ESDK][Loc]With VS 17.7 preview 2 + net 8 preview 5, warning NETSDK1201 message is unlocalized when publishing net 7.0 project. #32595

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Standardize error messages #33084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package (#29787) #32734
    Area-Compilers, Servicing-approved, 7.0.8
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve warning message for ILLink runtime pack #33041
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32975
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] added `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.dll` to package content #32375
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 7.0.8
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32713
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • PackageValidation compare TargetFrameworkInformation instead of TargetFramework property directly #33036
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Update branding to 6.0.119 #33054
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.314 #33055
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.305 #33059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.108 #33057
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.411 #33056
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Startup race condition #33007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add GarbageCollectionAdaptationMode msbuild property #33043
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • ProcessFrameworkReferences if tool packs are required #33062
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add zsh compdef completion script. #14239
  • Don't run helix tests if the build fails #33045
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WIP] Add support for starting the application through CMD (instead of ENTRYPOINT). #33037
    untriaged
  • Add dependencies needed for source-build PVP flow #33039
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Validate existing suppressions and remove unnecessary suppressions when re-generating suppression files #32964
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [Containers] Fix registry operations that use chunks and various resiliency enhancements #33019
    Area-Containers
  • Containers: add support for using 'podman' without a system 'docker' alias. #32783
    untriaged
  • Remove DynamicCodeSupport default from SDK #33040
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] [Bug]: New documentation comment tags are not closed automatically, manually closing results in automatic insertion #68481
  • [LSP] [Bug]: No suggestions displayed when attempting to add a new documentation comment tag #68480
  • [LSP] [Feature Request]: Improve adding new lines to documentation comments #68479
  • Post-Build Analyzer Reporting: Log analyzer performance metrics in Sarif v2 #68476
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer #68469
  • Go-to definition doesn't work anymore on project references #68472
  • Sticky Scroll Issue for Nested Switch Cases #68467
  • Refactor code to specified region #68466
  • Tools -> Options -> Text Editor -> C# -> Code Style -> Formatting Doesn't Always Show Examples #68465
  • the rename variable utility renames more variable then needed #68464
  • Reconsider license for Microsoft.CommonLanguageServerProtocol.Framework and related projects #68463

Closed

  • Invalid CS8602 calling base constructor when using primary constructors #68384
    17.7
  • Copy constructor should not be allowed to omit this initializer call in a type that is not a record #68345
    17.7
  • IDE0039 is not reported for implicitly typed lambda #68439
  • TestTypeAliases tests are failing in roslyn-ci main #68312
    17.7
  • C# 12 primary constructors + ObsoleteAttribute #68349
    17.7
  • Unable to specify abstract generic method with Task<T?> return #68473
  • CS3002 text is different for nullable Func<>? than non-nullable Func<>. #68438

PullRequests

Created

  • Primary ctors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Running PR val #68474
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Switch to new lower-overhead spell checking protocol #68426
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure we only ask for a symbol's documentation comment once #68452
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move off of recursion when determining pp-directive information for a file. #68460
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'use local function' with implicitly typed lambdas #68448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • `makeNotNullMembersMaybeNull` - skip primary constructor capture fields #68441
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Only record class can have a copy constructor. #68442
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Skip test that is causing issues in CI #68468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Disable MacOS on PRs #68470
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Set TypeDeclarationFlags.AnyMemberHasAttributes for a type with parameter list and a method-targeted attribute. #68444
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Inline Hints - Don't allow double click and insert params arguments #68434
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Implement IOperation support for inline array access #68373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Updated

  • Skip checks for overridden or hidden members in overload resolution with extension methods #68316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for 'primary header spans' in sticky-scroll. #68450
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix inserting new values with source generators #68451
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Add design for interceptors with nonzero arity #68218
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allocate less in GetTypeByMetadataName #68415
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge internal fork of LSP tools back into Roslyn #68461
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement extension member lookup (non-generic) #68342
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, untriaged
  • Update our 'delay until visible' logic to not throw cancellation exceptions #68382
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to primary constructors in IDE layer #68299
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refine parsing of potentially ambiguous casts/index expressions with collection literals #68456
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add assertions for shape of possibly intercepted call #68447
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support 'foreach' for inline arrays. #68297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Implement definite assignment and region analysis for inline array types #68339
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Fix 'Use Local Function' fixer in code style layer #68457
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Package Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Test.Utilities for razor #68417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow parsing `ref readonly` modifier #68164
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • [EnC] Upgrade change types for containing types #68368
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plaintext #48658
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #48657
  • SPA Proxy Development Server doesn't auto refresh on .NET Core 6.0 & angular 13 #48651
  • [SSR] Route parameter not working with page directive #48649

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #48622
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, single_query #48621
  • Perf regression: plaintext #48645
  • ASP.NET Identity cookie value set to blank. #48529
  • PasswordValidator - why does IsUpper and IsLower methods checks only latin characters #48583
  • Bug with specific word in [Authorize] Policy Attribute #48586
  • Is the Blazor web app (United) model still as easy to develop as blazor? Will the interaction between onlick and js still be as easy as it was in blazor? #48633
  • Mvc.Api.Analyzers.ApiConventionAnalyzer throws ArgumentNullException when action doesn't return #48528
    .NET 8 Planning
  • RZ10012 warning and MSBuild 17.6 #48281
  • Blazor Server DelegateHandler does not receive correct (circuit-)scoped service instance #48601
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json #48636

PullRequests

Created

  • Support IHttpSysRequestInfoFeature and IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature in IIS in proc server #48663
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • feat: Add StringSyntaxAttribute for guid and timespan args #48662
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Recursive binding and removing prefix allocations #48654
    area-blazor
  • Switch to bootstrap icons #48652
    area-blazor
  • Add diagnostics exception handling metrics #48648
    blocked, area-middleware
  • Add links to video for contribution guidelines #48647
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Do not publish wixpacks when postbuild sign is not true #48661
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Update selenium #48659
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Handle methods that never return in Api Analyzers #48623
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `797b0ad` to `04cf298` #48561

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to mix RTL and LTR characters in the same string when using collection view source. #15516
  • Failure Building Due to Splash Screen Image splashSplashScreen.png #15515
  • ScrollView Cuts Off Content Underneath it Depending on Simulator #15514
  • Visual Studio 17.6.2 breaks MAUI on Android builds #15510
  • Using x:static in App.xaml located in Platform -> Windows folder causes build to fail with, XamlCompiler error WMC0001: Unknown type 'Static' in XML namespace 'http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml' #15509
  • Scrollview.ScrollTo execution only returns after manual scroll #15508
    Backlog
  • Label.FormattedString shows inconsistent behaviour #15507
    Backlog
  • [Android] Changing the ImageSource of an Image causes a noticeable flicker #15501
    Backlog
  • Showing TitleBar and ToolbarItems on Android in a modal ContentPage in a MVVM Shell app #15498
  • [.NET8][Regression] Recipe main page cannot be swipe down #15494
    .NET 8
  • BlazorWebView doesn't download files #15493
  • CollectionView items have extra space on Windows #15492
    Backlog
  • VS 2022 17.6.2 IOS Simulator/Device not displaying correctly #15487

Closed

  • Random images shown in Image class on Android #12923
    Backlog
  • .Net 8P4 WPF/Maiu can't load Blazor Router #15287
    8.0-preview6
  • Maui Blazor - SCCM Remote Control freezes any input after connecting #15481
  • [.NET8][Regression] Buttons are unresponsive in New/Edit recipe page on windows #15488
  • Android webview is only loading "about:blank" when using custom WebviewClient with .Net 7.0 #11264
    Backlog
  • Grid wrong Row height #15330
    Backlog
  • System.IO.Stream support for MediaElement #15432
  • FontFamily = "OpenSans-Semibold.ttf"; to custom button not working in net 6 #15429
  • Label height too small when padding is greater than 1. #11511
    Backlog
  • Open a specific site in OneDrive for iOS #15489

PullRequests

Created

  • Ignore additional tests for iOS #15513
  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512

  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Security.SecurityCrypto from 1.1.0-alpha05 to 1.1.0-alpha06 #15503

  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.6.1 to 17.6.2 #15502
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Update ModalNavigationManager.cs #15483
  • Remove legacy launch settings #15511
  • Add the drag and drop gestures back to the appium ui tests for mac/ios targets #15484
    area/testing
  • Clear window from ContextStub after it's closed #15495
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • First pass at adding developer layout docs #15426
    area/layout 🔲
  • Don't reset App.Current OnResume if it's already set #15496
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] Update ModalNavigationManager.cs #15486
  • [net8.0] Update ModalNavigationManager.cs #15485

Updated

  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Fix CollectionView.RemainingItemsThresholdReached #15417
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1774.30 to 1.0.1823.32 #15474
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Don't double-inset Border strokes #15458
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295

  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Android: recreate activity on dark mode change #15449

  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should I be able to use the EF Core tools to apply migrations when using an interceptor to set my connection string #31055
  • SQLite SaveChanges: Don't use RETURNING unless WAL enabled #31053
  • Promote ExecuteUpdate/Delete from relational to core #31052
  • Cosmos: translate IN with parameter values again, and possibly other Cosmos-specific patterns #31051
  • Consider breaking out SelectExpression internal logic to the translation visitors #31049

Closed

  • Changing the names for relative tables #31019
  • How do I configure properties of Json Columns in EF Core 7? #31012
  • understanding change tracking in EF Core #31007
  • DBContext is not thread-safe. How to correctly use EFCore in a multi-threaded environment? Is it not recommended to use EFCore in multi-threaded programs? #30995
  • Make migrations .Designer file optional #30967
  • When object repeats itself in lazy loading it is coming null #30960
  • The binary operator Equal is not defined for the types 'System.Nullable`1[System.DateTime]' and 'System.DateTime' #30944
  • Constraint Generation Issue With TPH and multiple relationships #30877
  • [SCAFFOLDING] Wrong scaffolding with quirky composite primary key #31004
  • Make EngineEdition easier to understand #31037
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31054
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix to #31047 - Query: block projecting json entities/collection at root level in a tracking query #31048

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Stop skipping shadow skip navigation slots when creating the shadow values array #30911
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.8
  • Update branding to 6.0.19 #31044
  • Update branding to 7.0.8 #31045
  • Generate OPENJSON with WITH unless ordering is required #30983
  • Make EngineEdition more readable #31038

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Fix handling of queries with RETURNING clause #31013
    Servicing-consider
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw from 2.1.4 to 2.1.5 #30949
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Support any expression type inside inline primitive collections #31046
  • Imporved ToArrayAsync extension method #31041
  • [release/7.x] Disable trigger enumeration on Azure Synapse Analytics, where triggers are not supported #31036
